name: Influencer - Life Simulator
description:
Influencer Life is the most REALISTIC, AD FREE and CHALLENGING social simulator on the AppStore. Everyone wants to be an influencer but it's a lot easier said than done. 

Start at the bottom and build your brand as you climb the ranks to social stardom. Based on REAL world concepts, you'll be:

• Carving out a NICHE that changes the game every time you play.

• Hiring a social ENTOURAGE to edit your photos, write captions, advise on finances and more

• Managing KEY metrics that determine how much brands are willing to PAY you to post

• Signing and negotiating CONTRACTS with INFLUENCER AGENCIES

• Launching PRODUCT lines related to your niche

• Buying inventory, setting prices and SELLING your products to your followers

• Selling your TRAILER and BUYING MANSIONS

• Navigating over 50 events with fresh updates to keep you on your toes

• Competing on GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS
